articles.title: French GP recap: Leclerc’s title hopes go up in smoke
articles.description: After this victory, Verstappen goes into the next race with a 63 point cushion in the title race, a lead that could very well become unassailable for Leclerc and Ferrari, especially if Verstappen continues to grab easy wins.
